item.title: Cheviot Motel & Holiday Park
item.desc:
"THE QUIET ONE"
Set on 5 tranquil acres away from the busy SH1 but still within walking distance of the town centre. Our 'Kiwiana' setting includes 6 newly refurbished motel units, 2 cabins (including Cheviot's original Jailhouse), 8 powered sites and large camping area.
Pet friendly in camp and cabins.
Tariff from $15-$120
